p: NE treatment for 48 h in molluscs of 3-5 mm treated with 78 and 32 ppm caused 100%, and 93.3% mortality, respectively. When treated for 48 h, molluscs of 6-7 mm showed 100% mortality in the presence of 47 ppm NE ( Figs 3, 4). Molluscs of 8-10 mm showed mortality in the range of 100% when treated with 47 ppm ( Table IV).
